name: CTRubyAlignment
desc: Constants that specify how to align the ruby text and the base text relative to each other when they have different lengths.

items.name: case auto
items.desc: Core Text automatically determines the alignment.

items.name: case start
items.desc: Aligns the ruby text with the starting edge of the base text.

items.name: case center
items.desc: Centers the ruby text within the width of the base text.

items.name: case end
items.desc: Aligns the ruby text with the ending edge of the base text.

items.name: case distributeLetter
items.desc: Distributes the ruby text evenly over the width of the base text, aligning the first and last characters of the ruby text with the first and last characters of the base text.

items.name: case distributeSpace
items.desc: Distributes the ruby text evenly over the width of the base text, adding space before the first and after the last character.

items.name: case lineEdge
items.desc: Aligns the ruby text to an adjacent line edge.
